meanings.definition: A company that provides scheduled flights for passengers and cargo.
meanings.sent1: The airlines offer affordable tickets for travelers.
meanings.sent2: I always choose reputable airlines for my international trips.
meanings.sent3: Why did the airlines break up with the airport? They needed some space!
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took flight with the airlines of opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The airlines soared through the sky like graceful birds.

meanings.definition: The system or industry of operating aircraft.
meanings.sent1: The growth of airlines has revolutionized travel.
meanings.sent2: Pilots play a crucial role in the success of airlines.
meanings.sent3: Why did the airlines bring a ladder to the party? To reach new heights!
meanings.sent4: In the business world, competition among airlines is fierce.
meanings.sent5: The efficiency of airlines keeps the world connected.
